member_organisations:
All members are published on our homepage:  
www.european-logistics-platform.eu
fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: ELP is monitoring and analysing all developments which are discussed in EU society and the political environment concerning logistics and supply chain industries.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
1. Discuss full range of logistics and supply chains forging a more integrated policy approach to tackle challenges of industry. 
 
2. Call for the establishment of an EP Interparlamentary Group on logistics/supply chain.
